railgun.dialog.connections.description: Add or remove connected websites from **%{railgun}**.
railgun.dialog.connections.title: Manage Connected Websites
railgun.dialog.delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete **%{railgun}**?
railgun.dialog.delete.title: Please confirm
railgun.dialog.disable.description:
Are you sure you want to disable **%{railgun}**?

Disabling **%{railgun}** will disconnect Railgunu2122 from: **%{zones_connected}**. Websites you have associated with **%{railgun}** will be reconnected if you reenable it.
railgun.dialog.disable.title: Please confirm
railgun.dialog.finish_setup.description:
To complete the setup of **%{railgun}** please follow these instructions:
- [Railgunu2122 Installation Instructions](https://developers.cloudflare.com/railgun/user-guide/set-up).

Your activation key is:
**%{activation_key}**

This key is specifically for Railgunu2122 **%{railgun}**. Protect this key like a password!
railgun.dialog.finish_setup.title: Railgunu2122 Setup
railgun.dialog.view_key.description:
**%{activation_key}**

This key is specifically for Railgunu2122 **%{railgun}**. Protect this key like a password!
railgun.dialog.view_key.title: Railgunu2122 Activation Key
railgun.error.name: You have entered a name which cannot be used for a Railgunu2122.
railgun.mgmt.table.name: Name
railgun.upgrade.message: Railgun v%{version} is available. Please download and install Railgun from the [Cloudflare downloads page](%{link})
railgun.mgmt.table.empty: You have no Railgun servers currently configured.
